title: Moncton mother wants students returning from Europe to self-quarantine
description: A Moncton-area mother says high school students returning from Europe this week should be told to self-quarantine as a precaution against COVID-19.
content: A Moncton area mother says high school students returning from Europe this week should be told to self quarantine as a precaution against COVID About Bernice MacNaughton High School students and chaperons departed Feb to visit Germany Austria Sw chars
